name: Building Cumulative Risk Assessment
description: This analysis computes the combined earthquake and tsunami damage for buildings.

inputs.name: Result Name
inputs.description: Specify the name of the result dataset

inputs.name: Buildings
inputs.description: Please select from the list or use the search button to choose which Building inventory dataset you want to compute combined damage for.

inputs.name: Earthquake Damage
inputs.description: Please select from the list a building earthquake damage dataset or use the create button to generate building damage.

inputs.name: Tsunami Damage
inputs.description: Please select from the list a building tsunami damage dataset or use the create button to generate building damage.

inputs.name: Expected Value
inputs.description: Select a dataset that contains the Damage Ratios for buildings. Damage ratios provide numerical correlation between damage states and mean damage.

name: Roadway Restoration
description: Computes the functionality of a roadway, based on the expected damage.

inputs.name: Result Name
inputs.description: Specify the name of the result dataset

name: Electric Power Network Damage, Tornado
description: This analysis computes the damage of electric power network based on a tornado hazard.

inputs.name: Result Name
inputs.description: Specify the name of the result dataset

inputs.name: Electric Power Network
inputs.description: Search and/or create the electric power network to analyze.

inputs.name: Tornado Hazard
inputs.description: Search and/or create the tornado hazard that causes the damage

outputs.name: Electric Power Network Damage
outputs.description: Resulting damage in the power network after a hazard
